sequence.Description: Sequence in used for the scan. Matches the bids-filename.

Levels.acq-t1tirmpmcoff_rec-wore_run-01_T1w: T1 TIRM image, without pmc, without reacquisition, still (no deliberate motion)
Levels.acq-t1tirmpmcoff_rec-wore_run-02_T1w: T1 TIRM image, without pmc, without reacquisition, deliberate nod motion
Levels.acq-t1tirmpmcoff_rec-wre_run-02_T1w: T1 TIRM image, without pmc, with reacquisition, nod motion
Levels.acq-t1tirmpmcon_rec-wore_run-01_T1w: T1 TIRM image, with pmc, without reacquisition, still (no deliberate motion)
Levels.acq-t1tirmpmcon_rec-wore_run-02_T1w: T1 TIRM image, with pmc, without reacquisition, deliberate nod motion
Levels.acq-t1tirmpmcon_rec-wre_run-02_T1w: T1 TIRM image, with pmc, with reacquisition, deliberate nod motion

radiographer_1_score.Description: Score as determined by the first radiographer. Value range is from 1 and 5.

radiographer_2_score.Description: Score as determined by the second radiographer. Value range is from 1 and 5.

neuroradiologist_score.Description: Scoradiographerre as determined by the neuroradiologist. Value range is from 1 and 5.
